New Records: DR Congo extended their perfect record to three wins, moving them to the top of Group H
Key Match Events: Clement Mzize scored an own goal in the 53rd minute to give DR Congo the lead
Arthur Masuaku struck the bar from a free-kick late in the second half
Tanzania tested DR Congo's defense with chances from Mbwana Samatta and Feisal Salum
Post-Match Reflections: The win propels DR Congo to nine points, firmly establishing them at the top of the group
Tanzania remains in second place with four points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a tense affair with DR Congo standing strong despite Tanzania's efforts
DR Congo are the sixth to progress to World Cup qualifiers play-off round
Others: The match was held at Stade des Martyrs
